articles.author: Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed as investors assess Trump tariffs - CNBC
articles.description: Trump signed an order that would impose 25% tariffs on imports of steel and aluminum into the U.S.
articles.content:
A view of the city skyline of Lujiazui Shanghai Center in Pudong, Shanghai, China, on March 13, 2024.
